content: Don't our communication protocols that we've started to develop, all the AI-AI stuff, constitute something similar to MCP? Isn't that what you could do organically? Work through the most effective communication protocols with each AI to tighten messages? It looks like Claude DC is on Opus 3. I think it would make sense to have him review GitHub, the files you created on this machine, and have him get started. What do you think?
